speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, due to official business in the 13th Congressional District of Michigan, I was unable to be present for three votes. Had I been present, I would have voted "yea" on H.R. 407, the Columbia-Pacific National Heritage Area Study Act; "yea" on H.R. 1025, the Lower Republican River Basin Study Act; and "yea" on H. Res 371, In observance of National Physical Education and Sports Week.
